channel.title: Amazon on Just a memo
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon on Just a memo

item.title: Amazon Kindle and Read-only file system
item.description: Some times ago I’ve moved on 64 bit system and my first problem with new system was a situation when I couldn’t copy any files to my Amazon Kindle 5. Every time, when I’ve tried to delete some file from my Kindle, I got following error: [Errno 30] Read-only file system Here is the solution how to fix it: First of all you need to determine your device in the system.
